name: Solar Run
description:
Centuries of unsustainable practices by humanity led to the severe degradation of the earth’s atmosphere which has created polluted monsters which still roam the city. Survivors have learnt to live in harmony with the sun and wind. These survivors move around the city harvesting sun orbs which they use to power their technology and help others to survive, they are the children of the sun, the solar punks.

So go and get all the solar orbs you can, killing all the polluted monsters!

Music: 

The Epic 2  by Rafael Krux

Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/5384-the-epic-2-
